meanings.definition: Not able to be cured or healed.
meanings.sent1: The doctor sadly informed the patient that his condition was immedicable.
meanings.sent2: The immedicable disease left the villagers feeling helpless.
meanings.sent3: Despite trying various remedies, the immedicable illness refused to budge.
meanings.sent4: The immedicable pain in her heart lingered long after the breakup.
meanings.sent5: The immedicable wound on the tree trunk served as a reminder of the storm's fury.
